DOC.brief_summary: We hypothesized that the McGrath MAC EMS is beneficial for intubation of pediatric manikins while performing CPR. In the current study, we compared effectiveness of the McGrath MAC EMS and MIL laryngoscopes in child resuscitation with and without CC.
DOC.criteria: Give voluntary consent to participate in the study paramedic student Not meet the above criteria Wrist or Low back diseases
